lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps had no appetite for a rematch with Ryan Lochte in the 400 meters medley so left it to the swimmer he calls his little brother to beat up on an old foe at the U.S. Olympic swim trials on Sunday.

headline.main: Phelps Happy to Let 'Little Brother' Take Down Old Foe
headline.print_headline: Phelps Happy to Let 'Little Brother' Take Down Old Foe

snippet: Michael Phelps had no appetite for a rematch with Ryan Lochte in the 400 meters medley so left it to the swimmer he calls his little brother to beat up on an old foe at the U.S. Olympic swim trials on Sunday....
